description: The School Improvement Grant (SIG) program data depicts the location, award amount and type of model selected by States in awarding nearly $3.5 billion in School Improvement Grant funds nationally in 2010 to turn around their persistently lowest achieving schools.

name: Bronx School Improvement Grants
